text: The following places are called Bures: *Bures, Orne, a commune of France in the department of Orne *Bures, Meurthe-et-Moselle, a commune of France in the department of Meurthe-et-Moselle *Bures-en-Bray, a commune of France in the department of Seine-Maritime *Bures-les-Monts, a commune of France in the department of Calvados *Bures-sur-Yvette, a commune of France in the department of Essonne *Bures, England, a village that straddles the county border between Suffolk and Essex **Bures Hamlet, the portion of the village in Essex **Bures St. Mary, the portion of the village in Suffolk *Bures, Saskatchewan, a hamlet in Saskatchewan, Canada == See also == * Bureš, a Czech surname * Mount Bures, Essex, England
title: Bures
